summaryOfNewsArticle: A major military conflict between Nation A and Nation B began on April 4, 2024, following a surprise attack on Military Base X. The attack prompted a swift counter-offensive by Nation B, leading to widespread hostilities. On April 5, 2024, an international coalition intervened, deploying peacekeeping forces and increasing diplomatic pressure. By April 6, 2024, a ceasefire agreement was announced, marking a potential turning point in the conflict. The key developments during this period include the initial attack, rapid escalation, international intervention, and the eventual ceasefire.
title: Conflict Between Nation A and Nation B Escalates, Ceasefire Reached After International Intervention
